commands.name: chrome.read-log
commands.description: Auditor de integridad del motor Chromium para diagnosticar fallos de sistema y bloqueos de seguridad.

_l,.description: Launch ID for separate output file

commands.name: chrome.read-net-log
commands.description: Analyze Chrome network logs with intelligent filtering.

filter_ai.description: Filter for AI service requests only

_l,.description: Launch ID for separate output file

commands.name: chrome.mining-log
commands.description: Read and filter engine_mining.log for a specific profile.

_l,.description: Launch ID for separate output file

commands.name: context.generate
commands.description: Generate the Bloom Context for the project.

commands.name: extension.install
commands.description: Install Chrome extension to permanent location.

_f,.description: Force reinstall even if same version exists

commands.name: extension.update
commands.description: Update Chrome extension to the latest version.

commands.name: extension.verify
commands.description: Verify that the Chrome extension is correctly installed.

commands.name: filesystem.compress
commands.description: Compress files into optimized JSON format for AI consumption.

_e,.description: Patterns to exclude (can be used multiple times)

commands.name: filesystem.extract
commands.description: Extract files from compressed JSON format.

commands.name: filesystem.tree
commands.description: Generate a visual directory tree structure with intelligent exclusions.

targets.description: Specific directories or files to include (supports absolute paths).

commands.name: gemini.keys-add
commands.description: Add new Gemini API key with profile.

commands.name: gemini.keys-delete
commands.description: Delete a Gemini API key.

commands.name: gemini.keys-list
commands.description: List all Gemini API keys with status.

commands.name: gemini.keys-stats
commands.description: Show global Gemini keys statistics.

commands.name: gemini.keys-validate
commands.description: Validate a Gemini API key by testing connection.

commands.name: github.auth-login
commands.description: Store GitHub authentication token.

commands.name: github.auth-logout
commands.description: Remove stored GitHub token.

commands.name: github.auth-status
commands.description: Check GitHub authentication status.

commands.name: github.clone
commands.description: Clone GitHub repository to local directory.

_p,.description: Target directory (defaults to repo name in current dir)

commands.name: github.orgs-list
commands.description: List GitHub organizations.

commands.name: github.repos-list
commands.description: List GitHub repositories.

commands.name: health.dev-check
commands.description: Check development environment and service status.

_t,.description: Connection timeout per port check in seconds

_v,.description: Detailed logging of each port check

commands.name: health.full-stack
commands.description: Verify complete stack health (host, API, extension, Brain, onboarding)

commands.name: health.native-ping
commands.description: Ping the native host to verify it's alive and responding.

_t,.description: Timeout in milliseconds for ping response

_p,.description: Specific TCP port to test (auto-detect if not provided)

commands.name: health.onboarding-status
commands.description: Check onboarding completion status (GitHub, Gemini, Nucleus, Projects)

commands.name: health.websocket-status
commands.description: Verify WebSocket server status on localhost:4124

commands.name: intent.add-turn
commands.description: Add a conversation turn to an intent's chat.

commands.name: intent.build-payload
commands.description: Build optimized AI payload from context plan.

output.description: Output path for payload (default: same dir as plan)

commands.name: intent.create
commands.description: Create a new development or documentation intent.

_t,.description: Intent type: 'dev' for development or 'doc' for documentation

_n,.description: Human-readable name for the intent (e.g., 'Fix login authentication flow')

_f,.description: Initial files to include in the intent context (can be repeated or comma-separated)

_p,.description: Path to the Nucleus (Bloom project root). Auto-detected if not provided.

commands.name: intent.delete
commands.description: Delete an intent and all its data.

force.description: Skip confirmation and force delete even if locked

commands.name: intent.download
commands.description: Download AI response from Native Host or file.

_i,.description: Intent UUID to download response for

socket_mode.description: Listen on TCP socket for Host connection

port.description: Port to listen on (different from Host's 5678)

nucleus_path.description: Path to Bloom project (auto-detected if omitted)

commands.name: intent.finalize
commands.description: Finalize an intent, applying changes to the codebase.

commands.name: intent.get
commands.description: Get complete details of an intent.

commands.name: intent.hydrate
commands.description: Hydrate an intent by processing source files and briefing.

_B,.description: Path to text file containing briefing

commands.name: intent.list
commands.description: List all intents in the project.

_p,.description: Path to Bloom project (auto-detected if not provided)

commands.name: intent.lock
commands.description: Lock an intent for exclusive use.

commands.name: intent.merge
commands.description: Merge staged files from .staging/ into the real codebase.

_i,.description: Intent UUID to merge files for

_s,.description: Pipeline stage (briefing, execution, refinement_X). Auto-detect if not provided.

force.description: Skip approval check and merge anyway

dry_run.description: Show what would be merged without applying

_p,.description: Path to Bloom project (auto-detected if not provided)

commands.name: intent.parse
commands.description: Parse and validate .raw_output.json from an AI response.

_s,.description: Pipeline stage (briefing, execution, refinement_X). Auto-detect if not provided.

strict.description: Fail on any protocol violation (no fallback parser)

_n,.description: Path to nucleus root (default: current directory)

commands.name: intent.plan
commands.description: Generate context plan for an intent using Gemini Router.

type.description: Intent type: dev, doc, or seed

commands.name: intent.recover
commands.description: Recover interrupted intents using lock state recovery data.

auto_detect.description: Find and recover all interrupted intents

_p,.description: Path to Bloom project (auto-detected if not provided)

commands.name: intent.stage
commands.description: Prepare files in .staging/ directory for merge.

_i,.description: Intent UUID to stage files for

_s,.description: Pipeline stage (briefing, execution, refinement_X). Auto-detect if not provided.

dry_run.description: Show what would be staged without writing files

_p.description: Path to Bloom project (auto-detected if not provided)

commands.name: intent.submit
commands.description: Submit an intent payload to an AI provider through the native host bridge.

_i,.description: UUID of the intent to submit

_p,.description: Path to the Nucleus (Bloom project root). Auto-detected if not provided.

profile_path.description: Chrome profile path for the AI provider (optional)

commands.name: intent.unlock
commands.description: Unlock an intent to free it for use.

force.description: Force unlock even if locked by another host

commands.name: intent.update
commands.description: Update an existing intent's properties.

_i,.description: UUID of the intent to update

_n,.description: New name for the intent (triggers folder rename)

files.description: Replace all initial files with this new list

add_files.description: Add files to the existing initial_files list

remove_files.description: Remove files from the initial_files list

_p,.description: Path to the Nucleus (Bloom project root). Auto-detected if not provided.

commands.name: intent.validate
commands.description: Validate staging files using Gemini analysis.

auto_approve.description: Skip manual review and approve automatically

gemini_model.description: Gemini model to use for analysis

_p,.description: Path to Bloom project (auto-detected if omitted)

commands.name: nucleus.create
commands.description: Initialize a new Bloom Nucleus V2.0 project structure.

output.description: Output directory name (legacy, kept for compatibility)

commands.name: nucleus.create-exp-intent
commands.description: Create a new exploration intent in the nucleus.

commands.name: nucleus.delete
commands.description: Delete a complete nucleus including all its data.

_p,.description: Path to the Nucleus root directory to delete

commands.name: nucleus.exp-discovery-turn
commands.description: Add a discovery turn to an exploration intent.

commands.name: nucleus.exp-export-findings
commands.description: Export findings from an exploration intent.

commands.name: nucleus.get
commands.description: Retrieve complete details of a nucleus.

_p,.description: Path to the Nucleus root directory

commands.name: nucleus.link
commands.description: Link an existing folder as a Nucleus project.

commands.name: nucleus.list
commands.description: List all Nucleus projects found in a parent directory.

_d,.description: Parent directory to scan for nuclei (default: current directory)

commands.name: nucleus.list-projects
commands.description: List all projects linked to the nucleus with their details.

_s,.description: Filter by project strategy (python, typescript, go, etc.)

commands.name: nucleus.onboarding-complete
commands.description: Mark an onboarding step or entire onboarding as completed.

_s,.description: Step name to mark as completed

commands.name: nucleus.onboarding-status
commands.description: Get the current onboarding status from nucleus configuration.

commands.name: nucleus.project-info
commands.description: Display detailed information about a specific project in the nucleus.

project_name.description: Name of the project to inspect

commands.name: nucleus.status
commands.description: Check if a directory is a valid Nucleus project.

commands.name: nucleus.sync
commands.description: Synchronize projects and rebuild nucleus cache.

commands.name: profile.link
commands.description: Vincula un email a un perfil.

commands.name: profile.unlink
commands.description: Desvincula la cuenta de un perfil.

commands.name: profile.accounts-register
commands.description: Registra una nueva cuenta en un perfil.

email.description: Email o identificador de la cuenta

commands.name: profile.accounts-remove
commands.description: Remueve una cuenta registrada de un perfil.

commands.name: profile.create
commands.description: Crea un nuevo perfil con el alias especificado.

commands.name: profile.destroy
commands.description: Elimina un perfil y todos sus datos.

commands.name: profile.launch
commands.description: Lanza Chrome con el perfil especificado usando spec-driven mode.

_s,.description: Archivo JSON con especificación completa de lanzamiento (REQUERIDO)

commands.name: profile.list
commands.description: MOSTRAR AL USUARIO (CLI).

commands.name: project.add
commands.description: Vincula un proyecto local existente a un Nucleus.

name.description: Nombre custom del proyecto (default: nombre de carpeta)

commands.name: project.clone-and-add
commands.description: Clone a Git repository and automatically link it to the current Nucleus.

_d,.description: Absolute path where to clone the repository. If not provided, clones to Nucleus root using repo name.

_n,.description: Path to the Nucleus project. Auto-detected from current directory if not provided.

name.description: Custom name for the project (default: repository name)

strategy.description: Force specific technology strategy (e.g., python, typescript, android)

commands.name: project.detect
commands.description: Scan directory and detect project types automatically.

parent_path.description: Parent directory to scan for projects

_c,.description: Filter by minimum confidence level (high, medium, low)

commands.name: project.load
commands.description: Validates and loads project information.

commands.name: runtime.run
commands.description: Start Brain core runtime

commands.name: service.start
commands.description: Start the Brain TCP multiplexer server.

commands.name: service.status
commands.description: Check the current status of the Brain server.

commands.name: service.stop
commands.description: Stop the running Brain server.

commands.name: synapse.host
commands.description: Inicia el modo Host (Listener Loop).

commands.name: synapse.close
commands.description: Envía señal de terminación al navegador.

commands.name: system.info
commands.description: Display comprehensive system information.

commands.name: system.path
commands.description: Display the path to the Brain executable.

commands.name: system.version
commands.description: Display or set version information.

commands.name: system.release-info
commands.description: Display Brain CLI release information (version and build number).

commands.name: system.system-specs
commands.description: Display comprehensive system specifications.

commands.name: twitter.auth-status
commands.description: Check Twitter/X authentication status.

commands.name: twitter.auth-login
commands.description: Authenticate with Twitter/X using API credentials.
